titleStmt.title: Arviragus and Philicia As it was acted at the Private House in Black-Fryers by his Majesties servants. The first and second part.
titleStmt.author: Carlell, Lodowick, 1602?-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for Iohn Crooke and Richard Sergier, and are to be sold at the Grey-hound in S. Pauls Church-yard,
